books_2024.Title: Pachinko
books_2024.Author: Min Jin Lee
books_2024.Description: An epic historical novel that follows four generations of a Korean family as they immigrate to Japan, confronting issues of identity, love, sacrifice, and survival amidst discrimination and political turmoil.

books_2024.Title: Bride (Bride, #1)
books_2024.Author: Ali Hazelwood
books_2024.Description: A dangerous alliance between a Vampyre bride and an Alpha Werewolf evolves into a profound love story, exploring themes of political intrigue and forbidden romance in a richly imagined paranormal world.

books_2024.Title: Parable of the Sower (Earthseed, #1)
books_2024.Author: Octavia E. Butler
books_2024.Description: A dystopian novel set in a future America ravaged by climate change and social chaos, following a young woman with the ability to feel the pain of others as she develops a new belief system and leads a group of survivors toward a better future.

books_2024.Title: King of Sloth (Kings of Sin, #4)
books_2024.Author: Ana Huang
books_2024.Description: A contemporary romance novel exploring themes of love, ambition, and personal growth, centered around complex characters navigating their desires and responsibilities.

books_2024.Title: Gild (The Plated Prisoner, #1)
books_2024.Author: Raven Kennedy
books_2024.Description: A dark fantasy retelling of the King Midas myth, following a woman who has been turned to gold and kept in a gilded cage, exploring themes of power, freedom, and self-discovery.

books_2024.Title: Glint (The Plated Prisoner, #2)
books_2024.Author: Raven Kennedy
books_2024.Description: The sequel to 'Gild,' continuing the dark fantasy retelling of the King Midas myth, delving deeper into the protagonist's journey toward freedom and empowerment.

books_2024.Title: Not in Love (Not in Love, #1)
books_2024.Author: Ali Hazelwood
books_2024.Description: A contemporary romance novel exploring the complexities of modern relationships, personal growth, and the unexpected paths love can take.

books_2024.Title: Gleam (The Plated Prisoner, #3)
books_2024.Author: Raven Kennedy
books_2024.Description: The third installment in 'The Plated Prisoner' series, continuing the dark fantasy saga inspired by the King Midas myth, focusing on the protagonist's struggle for autonomy and identity.

books_2024.Title: King of Pride (Kings of Sin, #2)
books_2024.Author: Ana Huang
books_2024.Description: A contemporary romance novel delving into themes of pride, love, and redemption, featuring complex characters navigating their personal and professional lives.

books_2024.Title: King of Wrath (Kings of Sin, #1)
books_2024.Author: Ana Huang
books_2024.Description: A contemporary romance novel exploring themes of wrath, forgiveness, and the transformative power of love, centered around characters confronting their deepest fears and desires.

books_2024.Title: Assistant to the Villain (Assistant to the Villain, #1)
books_2024.Author: Hannah Nicole Maehrer
books_2024.Description: A fantasy romance novel featuring a protagonist who becomes the assistant to a notorious villain, blending elements of humor, adventure, and romance in a magical setting.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 1)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: Leslie, a girl abused by her power-hungry birth family, seeks adoption from Duke Salvator, renowned for her overwhelming strength.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 2)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: Leslie's journey continues as she uncovers more about her shadow magic and navigates her new life with Duke Salvator.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 3)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: Leslie faces new challenges and adversaries as she strives to protect her loved ones and master her powers.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 4)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: Leslie's bond with Duke Salvator deepens as they confront threats from both within and outside their family.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 5)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: Leslie discovers hidden truths about her past and the origins of her shadow magic.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 6)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: As political tensions rise, Leslie and Duke Salvator must navigate court intrigues and alliances.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 7)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: Leslie's strength and resolve are tested as she faces betrayal and unexpected challenges.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 8)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: Leslie attends a grand party hosted by Empress Medea, where hidden agendas and secrets unfold.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 9)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: Leslie uncovers a plot involving the priest selection candidates and a scheme to pilfer a sacred artifact.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 10)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: Leslie confronts the consequences of her actions and the impact on her family's legacy.

books_2024.Title: (The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter, Vol. 11)
books_2024.Author: MinJakk
books_2024.Description: In the series finale, Leslie's journey comes full circle as she embraces her destiny and forges a new path.

books_2024.Title: The Prisoner of Heaven (The Cemetery of Forgotten Books, #3)
books_2024.Author: Ruiz Zafon, Carlos
books_2024.Description: not set

books_2024.Title: Eight Billion Genies #1 (of 8)
books_2024.Author: Soule, Charles
books_2024.Description: Every person on Earth gets a genie; chaos erupts as wishes reshape reality.

books_2024.Title: Eight Billion Genies #2 (of 8)
books_2024.Author: Soule, Charles
books_2024.Description: Society collapses as people exploit their wishes in unpredictable ways.

books_2024.Title: Eight Billion Genies #3 (of 8)
books_2024.Author: Soule, Charles
books_2024.Description: A bar's patrons try to survive as the world descends into wish-fueled madness.

books_2024.Title: Eight Billion Genies #4 (of 8)
books_2024.Author: Soule, Charles
books_2024.Description: New factions emerge as the consequences of reckless wishes unfold.

books_2024.Title: Eight Billion Genies #5 (of 8)
books_2024.Author: Soule, Charles
books_2024.Description: Time distortions and reality-warping wishes escalate the chaos.

books_2024.Title: Eight Billion Genies #6 (of 8)
books_2024.Author: Soule, Charles
books_2024.Description: The survivors face new threats as the genies' rules become clearer.

books_2024.Title: Eight Billion Genies #7 (of 8)
books_2024.Author: Soule, Charles
books_2024.Description: The final countdown begins as the last wishes are used recklessly.

books_2024.Title: Eight Billion Genies #8
books_2024.Author: Soule, Charles
books_2024.Description: The explosive finale reveals the fate of humanity after the wishpocalypse.
